title: Sausages with Mustardy Lentils and Mash
ingredients: ['1 tbsp olive oil', '1 red onion, thinly sliced', '2 tsp sugar', '900g floury potatoes, peeled and cut into small pieces', '8 good-quality sausages', '100ml dry cider', '1 tbsp Worcestershire sauce', '150ml chicken stock, made with a stock cube', '1 (410g) tin green lentils, drained', '2 tbsp wholegrain mustard', '100ml milk, warmed', '50g butter', '2 tbsp chopped fresh parsley', 'salt and pepper to taste']
